branchNameLinter.msgDoesNotMatchRegex: Branch "%s" does not match the allowed pattern: "%s"
branchNameLinter.msgPrefixNotAllowed: Branch prefix "%s" is not allowed. Allowed prefixes: task, hotfix, setup
branchNameLinter.msgBranchDisallowed:
Pushing to "%s" is not allowed, use git-flow.

Example:
* task/01-api_models
